attributes.action: Ignore the calls for a second refererendum and exit Europe as soon as possible.
attributes.additional_details:
"EUROPES' NATIONS SHOULD BE GUIDED TOWARDS THE SUPERSTATE WITHOUT THEIR PEOPLE UNDERSTANDING WHAT IS HAPPENING.THIS CAN BE ACCOMPLISHED BY SUCCESSIVE STEPS, EACH DISGUISED AS HAVING AN ECONOMIC PURPOSE, BUT WHICH WILL EVENTUALLY AND IRREVERSIBY LEAD TO FEDERATION".
JEAN MONET, FOUNDING FATHER OF THE EU IN A LETTER TO A FRIEND ON APRIL 30TH 1952
If this quote does not chill people to the bone, then there is no hope for us. Forget all other arguments for or against. This is all you need to know.
attributes.background: We were fooled into joining The EU. People allow themselves to be manipulated.Just so that more land can be ruled by fewer people to consolidate power into the hands of the bankers, elite and most powerful families. We need to tell people the truth about why dismantling The EU is best for everyone.
